author: Chris Blok
comment: Love it, I downloaded it to my Moto 360. Battery drain is pretty bad. Please fix or make a version of this meant for the 360.this is the best looking digital face I ha e seen.

reply.author: Smartwatch Bureaux
reply.content:
Thank you for your feedback.
Today,I've done big update for the battery it's life can be extended.
Would you please check and install the latest version of the app.
Thank you.
